Farm Fresh

Fresh Produce ・ New York ・ December

Beets

Earthy and sweet, a good source for mineral and vitamins and great energy booster.

Buying

Select small to medium beets with firm, smooth skin and no soft spots or punctures. Those with stems and leaves still attached are best.

Storing

Store with greens in a produce bag in the coldest part of your refrigerator for up to two weeks. If you don’t have room for all that foliage, snip it off about an inch above the root.

Recipes

Beets and Herb Salad

French Peasant Beets

Gingered Beets Pickles
